Key Match Events: Jos Buttler hit five sixes in an over
Jos Buttler scored 78 runs off 36 balls
Pre-Game Insights: England needed to get 116 runs in 17.4 overs to qualify outright for the semis
England were behind the run rate early in the innings
The match was crucial for both teams to secure their positions in the tournament
Post-Match Reflections: Chris Jordan was praised for his performance
Jos Buttler expressed satisfaction with the team's performance
Adil Rashid was named player of the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: USA captain Aaron Jones acknowledged their poor recent performances
USA's USA all out for 115 runs
Others: Chris Jordan became the first English player to take a hat-trick at a T20 World Cup
The match was held at Kensington Oval in Barbados
